name: invidious
tagline: A privacy focused alternative front end for browsing YouTube content
description: Invidious is a privacy focused alternative front end for YouTube. It proxies video, search and subscriptions without ads or tracking, supports RSS feeds and multiple clients, and can be self hosted as a lightweight video portal.

features.title: YouTube Frontend
features.description: Provides an alternative web interface for viewing YouTube content

features.title: Privacy-Focused Viewing
features.description: Allows video playback without Google accounts or tracking

features.title: Video Playback
features.description: Streams videos directly through the web interface

features.title: Channel Subscriptions
features.description: Follows channels and builds subscription feeds without sign-in

features.title: Audio-Only Mode
features.description: Plays video content as audio streams

features.title: API Access
features.description: Enables third-party clients to access video data

features.title: Self-Hosted Frontend
features.description: Runs the frontend on your own infrastructure
